div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1128 Sudak environs, Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1910-1920 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. (Golenko) Contents: 32 AE Panticapaeum: 17 AE (as Minns, pl.5, 22 [3], 23 [1]; pl. 6, 3 [1]; BMC 41 [2], 43 [1], 44-46 [9]) Phanagoria: 14 AE (as Minns, pl. 9, 15) Dioscurias: 1 AE (as BMC 1-3) Disposition: Moscow Kazamanova, VDI 1963, no. 4, pp. 144-51
